description:
[h1]This mod adds paint guns and cannons so you can have fun painting stuff or playing PVP[/h1]
Features:[list]
[*]All spudguns as paintguns (press Q to change color)
[*]Crouch to swim in your own paint and even climb walls
[*]Mountable paintgun
[*]PVP game manager to enable pvp
[*]Turf Wars battle mode (paint most blocks to win)
[/list]

Please note the mod has quite a few bugs, and you might need to re-equip guns, re-place the game manager, or re-join your world.

[quote]
[h1]Â© NO Copyright[/h1]
I make mods for the community to enjoy! Therefore feel free to [b]copy anything[/b] from this mod. No credit necessary, but always appreciated!
[/quote]
name: ScrapToon Paintball
